Author: vanillastevia
Text: Yeah it’s the worst, it’s basically being told “We all see your physical form whether you like it or not” and I hate the reminder.

Author: SpaceWhale88
Text: A patient of mine at work said "so I've seen you've maintained you weight loss! Congrats!"   I've put on 15lbs over the last year.   Either people only remember me at 200lbs which makes me sad or anytime someone compliments me they are lying to be polite. I'm obese. I need to lose at least 35lbs lbs. . .but really more like 55lbs. I cant believe anyone bc I know the truth.
